title: PLEASE HELP ASAP!
body: So im launching my lol launcher and it starts updating but it stops at 33%. It says calculation difference/ files  33%. Idk what to do. Please help.

replies.body: wondering if something is wrong with the servers right now, if we are all having the same problem at the same time it's not just a coincidence, kinda suck though, that i started a ranked game and DC and can't get back on. first game of my promos to diamond
There is a sticky on the top of thew forum page read it: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/zPUA7Zyg-new-having-issues-patching-416-click-here

> There is a sticky on the top of thew forum page read it: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/zPUA7Zyg-new-having-issues-patching-416-click-here

This is the best place to go to first!  The steps there do typically resolve most of these issues!
Mine's also done the exact same thing cant get on League of Legends

Mine's just done the same thing repeatedly, keeps getting stuck at 'Scanning files', 33%.

And I'm fairly sure it shouldn't take that long since it's updated and all.

Edit - When I close it, I get the bugsplat window.
gg rito
rip pepperonis rito

> rip pepperonis rito

rip 1k rp
i had 3.4 on mine :O
Wonder if this has something to do with their live maintenance earlier.
You let it load.
I hit the repair and waited and waited.  Idk if that fixed it, but I did eventually get to log in.  Then I found multiple freezes that seized up my computer.
Everytime I hit repair, it would just close the launcher and give me the bugsplat window.
It finally loaded after a while, but it is still totally broken.  I have frozen 3 times in a row during the same game.
Well at least you got some progress,i am still stuck..:(
omg nobody knows a way to fix it
has anyone been able to get on?
Yea, the repair didn't do anything.  It scanned through all the files, just like we are all stuck at.  Then it reset and started scanning from 3 again.  It's a vicious cycle.
I'm having the same exact problem right now.  This is ridiculously annoying.

happening to me too, was trying to relog after getting packet loss. then this happens. guess i'll just lose some more LP for osmething thats totally out of my control. I am pretty used to it at this point.

Oh my god this is happening to me to..The hell is going on?

Could really use some help.

I want to know when Riot is going to start giving out care packages for the constant issues that are plaguing this game.  A few issues are understandable, but I'd say almost everyday for the past few months there have been issues with playability, connecting, patching, spectating, among others.  I think a random gift box would suffice.
Maybe we ought to send Rito care packages instead. New toasters, maybe even a new playpen for the hamsters they've got running things.
Don't bother hitting repair, just wasting more time doing that, doesn't work either
Give it some time.  If it is still stuck on that step after about an hour or so try running the repair tool.
